features.name: Rage
features.description: Enter into a state of primal ferocity. While raging, you have advantage on Strength checks and saving throws. When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you gain a bonus to the damage roll. You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. You can end the rage early as a bonus action.
features.usage: Two per short or long rest
conditions: Must not be wearing heavy armor
Must not be concentrating on a spell
Must not be knocked unconcious (or the rage ends early)
Must attack a hostile creature or take damage at least once per turn (or the rage ends early)

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + [DEX modifier] + [CON modifer]. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.
